org.openimaj.math.model.fit.residuals

Class DistanceComparatorResidual<I,D,M extends Model<I,D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.model.fit.residuals.AbstractResidualCalculator<I,D,M>
      • org.openimaj.math.model.fit.residuals.DistanceComparatorResidual<I,D,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of independent data
    D - type of dependent data
    M - type of model
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResidualCalculator<I,D,M>

    public class DistanceComparatorResidual<I,D,M extends Model<I,D>>
extends AbstractResidualCalculator<I,D,M>
    An implementation of a ResidualCalculator that uses a DistanceComparator to compute the error between the predicted and observed data point. In the case that the given DistanceComparator is a similarity measure, the similarities will be multiplied by -1 to ensure error increases with decreasing similarity.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
